original_text: The men whose names were listed came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah. They attacked the Hamites in their dwellings and also the Meunites who were there and completely destroyed them, as is evident to this day. Then they settled in their place, because there was pasture for their flocks.
korean_text: 이 명단에 기록된 사람들이 유다 왕 히스기야 때에 가서 그들의 장막을 쳐서 무찌르고 거기에 있는 모우님 사람을 쳐서 진멸하고 대신하여 오늘까지 거기에 살고 있으니 이는 그들의 양 떼를 먹일 목장이 거기에 있음이며

sentences.original_text: The men whose names were listed
came in the days of Hezekiah
They attacked the Hamites in their dwellings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하밋 사람들을 그들의 거주지에서 공격했고

sentences.original_text: and also the Meunites who were there
as is evident to this day
Then they settled in their place
because there was pasture for their flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 양 떼를 위한 목초지가 있었기 때문이다
